meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Steve Greene Olivia Colangelo Sid Chandrasekhar Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6016.

td.p: Steve Greene, a senior from UCLA from Elk Grove, California
Olivia Colangelo, a junior from the University of Notre Dame from Murrysville, Pennsylvania
Sid Chandrasekhar, a senior from the University of Pennsylvania from Saratoga, California

tr.td: CIVIL WAR QUOTES
SHOWING YOU THE ANNE HATHAWAY
BOOKS & AUTHORS
CITY BY HOTELS
GAME GOALS
THE OLD COLLEGE "TRI"

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Before marching to the sea, he said that "War is cruelty... the crueler it is, the sooner it will be over"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Before marching to the sea, he said that "War is cruelty... the crueler it is, the sooner it will be over"

Olivia
Steve
